title: Catatrama
text: Catatrama is a fungal <a href="genus">genus</a> in the <a href="Family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Amanitaceae">Amanitaceae</a>, <a href="Order%20%28biology%29">order</a> <a href="Agaricales">Agaricales</a>. Originally a <a href="monotypic">monotypic</a> genus with Catatrama costaricensis, found in "<a href="Quercus">Quercus</a> pilarius" forest in <a href="Costa%20Rica">Costa Rica</a>. In 2007, the species was reported from Brazil. Since then 2 additional species, one from <a href="Australia">Australia</a> and one from <a href="India">India</a> have been recognized.
